Description.Text: Other amenities/services: 8 suites with a separate bedroom usally on a upper floor, connected with the sitting area by an interior staircase. They also have private balconies or large common-use verandas. They can accommodate up to four - five persons. 7 studios which are one-bedroom appartments and have either a private balkony or they are placed around the courtyard. They can accommodate up to two persons and a child. All have direct dial phone, Internet connection through ISDN line, radio, safebox, a small fully equipped kitchenette, private bathroom.
Important place or monument close to the hotel: beach - 100m.
